峛字的基本解释

峛
lǐ
山低而长。
下山道。
〔峛崺〕同“逦迤”，曲折连绵，如“升东岳而知众山之峛峛也。”
丘名。

峛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǐ］
［《廣韻》力紙切，上紙，來。］
见“峛崺”。

峛字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峛； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页311第03
【廣韻】力紙切【集韻】輦爾切，?音邐峛崺，山卑長也。或作邐迤。【揚子·法言】觀東嶽而知衆山之峛崺也。　又峛崺，上下之道也。【揚雄·甘泉賦】登降峛崺。　【正字通】本作峛。峛原字从歺作。

峛字的起名意思

暂无。

峛
Basic explanation of words
峛
lǐ
The mountain is low and long.
Down the mountain road.
〔峛崺〕Same as "逦迤", with continuous twists and turns, such as "Ascend the Dongyue and know the mountains of the mountains."
Yau name.
峛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǐ］
["Guang Yun" cut the paper, load the paper, come. ]
See "峛崺".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峛; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 311 03
[Guangyun] Paper cutting with strength [Jiyun] Erqie,? Yinbei Yuluo, Shanbei is also long. Or make it difficult. [Yangtze·Fayan] Observing the Dongyue and knowing the mountains and mountains.　峛崺, the way up and down is also. 【Yangxiong·Ganquan Fu】Dengjiangyuyu.　【Zhengzitong】This is a picture. The original character is written from Xiao.
